ValidationRule.description: Only Enterprise Onboarding team can change the Stage field to Close.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = "Customer Onboarding", ISCHANGED(Stage__c), OR( ISPICKVAL((Stage__c),"Closed"), ISPICKVAL((Stage__c),"Completed")), $Profile.Name <> "Enterprise Onboarding", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Sales Operations", $Profile.Name <> "Sales Admin", $Profile.Name <> "Sales Operations Super User", NOT($Permission.Deal_Enablement_Read_Write_Cases) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Stage of the DSR to close or completed for Customer Onboarding.
